property.name: demo.server.port
property.description: Port where you can access the demo user interface (will need to forward on Sandbox VM)

property.name: demo.ambari.username
property.description: Username for user with admin access to Ambari

property.name: demo.ambari.password
property.description: Username for user with admin access to Ambari

property.name: demo.ambari.cluster_name
property.description: name of the cluster to interact with

property.name: demo.ambari.server
property.description: Server that ambari runs on (hostname or IP). Recommended to install demo on Ambari host and leave as '127.0.0.1'

property.name: demo.data.configuration
property.description: JSON data descriptor for defining random data generation

property.name: demo.zeppelin.notebooks_dir
property.description: Directory that Zeppelin notebooks reside in

property.name: demo.zeppelin.notebooks_dir
property.description: Directory that Zeppelin notebooks reside in
